inclusion.criterion: Male and female adults with clinical diagnosis of T2DM diagnosed at least 1 year before screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: South Asian origin including Afghanistani, Bangladeshi, Indian, Nepali, Pakistani and Sri Lankan
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient report of South Asian ancestry

inclusion.criterion: Fasting glucose on self-monitoring of blood glucose (SMBG) or laboratory testing < 15 mmol/L within the last 30 days
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Insulin naïve, uncontrolled on oral hypoglycemic medications
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient report of insulin use for only short-term emergency situations

inclusion.criterion: Kidney function assessment with eGFR >30 mL/min/1.73 m2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: lab result: Creatinine: 0.9 mg/dL with eGFR >60 mL/min

exclusion.criterion: History of insulin use (except emergency short-term use defined as less than 12 weeks for acute illness, hospitalization, pregnancy or with steroid use)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient report of long-term insulin use

exclusion.criterion: Use of GLP-1 receptor agonist in the past 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous discontinuation of a GLP-1 receptor agonist due to safety, tolerability or lack of efficacy
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient report of not being pregnant

exclusion.criterion: Currently on any supervised, intensive, weight-loss dietary or exercise program
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of gastroparesis with moderate or higher severity
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: lab result: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST): 17 U/L, Alanine aminotransferase (ALT): 14 U/L

notes: The patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis and is currently experiencing hyperglycemia. He reports being homeless and having lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies.
